scripts.package-mac: npx @electron/packager . Kosmolaris --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=icon.icns --prune=true --out=builds --app-copyright="Kosmolaris © 2024" --version-string.CompanyName="John Arrow Games" --version-string.ProductName="Kosmolaris" --version-string.FileDescription="Relaxing puzzle game"
scripts.package-win: npx @electron/packager . Kosmolaris --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=icon.ico --prune=true --out=builds --app-copyright="Kosmolaris © 2024" --version-string.CompanyName="John Arrow Games" --version-string.ProductName="Kosmolaris" --version-string.FileDescription="Relaxing puzzle game"
scripts.package-linux: npx @electron/packager . Kosmolaris --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=icon.ico --prune=true --out=builds --app-copyright="Kosmolaris © 2024" --version-string.CompanyName="John Arrow Games" --version-string.ProductName="Kosmolaris" --version-string.FileDescription="Relaxing puzzle game"
